text:
Lord Narayan became pleased by Kashyap's eulogies and austere penance.
 He appeared before the deities and asked them to demand anything they wished for.
 Kashyap requested him to give Aditi, the privilege of becoming his mother.
 Lord Vishnu agreed to take birth as Aditi's son.
 The deities became pleased and all of them proceeded back towards Kashyap's hermitage.
 When they reached Kurukshetra, the place where Kashyap had his hermitage, they inspired Aditi to commence her penance to please Lord Vishnu.
 Aditi did a severe penance for 10,000 years.
 The place where she did her penance later on became famous as Aditivan.
 Lord Vishnu was extremely pleased by her devotion.
title: Lord Narayana Blesses Kashyap
